meanings.definition: To add someone as a friend on a social networking site.
meanings.sent1: I friended my classmate on the app.
meanings.sent2: She friended her neighbor on the website.
meanings.sent3: He friended his dog on the internet, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The idea of friending a robot seemed strange to her.
meanings.sent5: The act of friending someone online is like a virtual handshake.

meanings.definition: To act as a friend towards someone.
meanings.sent1: She friended her new colleague by offering help.
meanings.sent2: He always friended others with kindness.
meanings.sent3: The cat friended the mouse, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His warm smile friended even the grumpiest of people.
meanings.sent5: In times of need, true friends always friended each other.

meanings.sent1: They friended each other after a meaningful conversation.
meanings.sent2: She friended the shy student in class.
meanings.sent3: The superhero friended the villain, creating an unexpected bond.
meanings.sent4: Their shared love for music friended them instantly.
meanings.sent5: The magic of summer camp friended them for life.
